title: Mirage
description: Nothing lasts forever. Nobody can control fate. Accidents happen and there’s nothing we can do about it.Mira Adams has her entire life ahead of her. Starting college with her best friend Kylee Anderson, the duo is ready to embrace everything life has to offer. Finding a boyfriend isn’t high on her list of priorities, but when Mira meets Danny Thomas and his best friend Skylar McBride, everything clicks and starts to make sense.Four years of college, life long bonds are forged. After graduation, Danny and Mira are planning their wedding and starting a life together, until tragedy strikes, leaving three broken people to pick up the pieces and mourn the loss of an intricate part of their quad.Skylar has always stood by the wayside, watching his best friend begin a life with the woman he fell in love with. Through pain, suffering and mending, Skylar can no longer keep his distance.Right when Mira thinks she’s moved on and has gotten her life back on track, everything spirals out of control.What if everything you thought you knew was nothing more than a Mirage?
author: Ashley Suzanne
